src_original: tena ca samādhinā mārapāśebhyaḥ parimucyeyuḥ,  na ca bhūyo raktacittamutpādayeyuḥ /
yā ca tatra strī puruṣaṃ sarāgaṃ nirīkṣeta gurviṇī bhavet,  nirīkṣitamātreṇa cobhayo rāgaḥ praśamet /  ye garbhavāsairdārakadārikā evaṃ kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
tadyathā devāstrayastriṃśā nandanti pramodanti kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti /
evaṃrūpaśca tatra buddhakṣetre garbhavāsā dārakadārikāḥ saptarātriṃdivasāni sukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ /
